Articles.Content: I am excited for new potential for modding with the new functionality and framework from KSP2!
I'm most excited for colonies, and using the ability to build spacecraft off world in innovative ways.
I am excited for colonies and interstellar travel.
Coloniiies, WOOOW, so excited!!

I'm excited to see all the awesome stuff the KSP community does with this game! All the cool challenges, creative vessel designs, bold missions, and of course I'm incredibly excited to see what the modders can achieve when they get their hands on the game. KSP1 has been an awesome 12 year long ride, and I'm excited to embark on the journey that will be KSP2!
I can't wait to finally go interstellar! After 1200 hours I still haven't made it to eve and back though...

I'm most definitely excited about the new science system, when that comes. The one in the first game eventually falls flat on its face, so I'm absolutely hoping that the new one feels more engaging -- though I must admit I don't have any clue what it might be.
I am excited for multiplayer where i can destroy friend rocket!

I am exicted for all the people who can play it. Looking forward to a new thread called.

"What did you do in KSP2 today"

I'm excited to later share the KSP journey with my friends in Multiplayer, introducing them slowly to the more fundamental concepts before we all make the pilgrimage to interstellar destinations unknown. Building a space agency capable of interstellar sounds incredible, but it sounds even better together!

I'm excited for...basically everything?  In particular, proper multithreading.

Edited February 24, 2023 by Silvia Dragoness
waiting for colonies
I'm super hyped by everything, especially multiplayer, to see if we can try to crash togetherXD

I'm looking forward to the new procedural wings. I think spaceplanes are much cooler than traditional rockets, so having a fleet of SSTOs of all sizes with better looking wings (and easier to make) is going to be a game-changer for me. I couldn't imagine going back to KSP1 after 9am tomorrow (EST). Hype is at an all time high, I don't know how I'm going to sleep tonight!
I'm excited for all the new truss parts! It's a small thing but they look really sweet.
I'm excited for multiplayer, because I wanted to play KSP with my friends for a long time! I think that teamwork (or rivalry) will give new opportunities and make the game more interesting
I'm excited about multiplayer and paintable parts!

I'm excited for maybe faster game starting times lmao
But also better graphics and such.
I'm really looking forward to the new career mode and better graphics.
Excited for the textures on new planets!
Kouston, we have a... FRIDAAAAY!!!
I'm excited that I can even feel their emotions while traveling in space with Kerbal, who reacts more actively!
I think the near future tech such as engine parts excites me most.
Very exited for colonies

Thanks for participating, everyone. We plugged the all the usernames into a random generator and told it to select 3.

Congratulations to @gussi111, @ILikeIke, and @TruthfulGnome on winning! Someone will be reaching out to you very shortly to give you your key.

Happy landings!
